 The golden disc moved around. The symbols moveing to the correct position. A 
light came from it. It showed a picture. It was a much older Megatron! Then 
scenes of unciron destroying cybertron and then pictures of Magmatron leading 
deadly armys of veichon across the planet. Suddenly Destructor appeared. "You 
must go to the pod wiith scorpinok and come and see me. And as you can see I 
was sent by you in the future to stop this future from accuring. Unfortunatly 
I was killed  before i could tell you of my mission. That was only part of 
the message. Please you can only activate the real disc. It is at my base."

--part1_56.67134d6.27a437ef_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
